title: pdichiaro/chipseq pipeline - params.input_bam schema
description: Schema for the BAM samplesheet file provided with params.input_bam for skip_alignment mode.

sample.errorMessage: Sample name must be provided and cannot contain spaces. Use only alphanumeric characters, underscores, dots, and dashes.

bam.errorMessage: BAM file must be provided, cannot contain spaces and must have extension '.bam'

bai.errorMessage: BAM index file cannot contain spaces and must have extension '.bai' or '.bam.bai'. Leave empty if not available (will be created).

replicate.errorMessage: Replicate number must be a positive integer (1, 2, 3, ...)

antibody.errorMessage: Antibody/target name. Use alphanumeric characters, underscores, dots, and dashes. Leave empty for input/control samples.

control.errorMessage: Control sample name must match a sample name in the 'sample' column. Leave empty for input samples.

control_replicate.errorMessage: Control replicate number must be a positive integer matching the replicate column of the control sample. Leave empty for input samples.
